def carve_svg(svg_image):
    svg_image = svg_image.replace('<svg', '<svg filter="url(#carved)"')
    filter_definition = ''
    svg_image = svg_image.replace('</svg>', filter_definition + '</svg>')
    return svg_image

                <fePointLight x="-5000" y="-10000" z="20000" />
